DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate long-term efficacy safety SM-13496 patient bipolar I disorder .
DOC.brief_title: A Long-Term Study SM-13496 Patients With Bipolar I Disorder .
DOC.detailed_description: The study objective evaluate long-term efficacy safety SM-13496 ( 20-120 mg/day ) patient bipolar I disorder .
DOC.criteria: Patients complete D1002001 study ・Patients complete D1002001 study consider investigator eligible without safety concern . Patients participate D1002001 study Patients fully inform understand objective , procedure , possible benefit risk study provide write voluntary consent participate study . Outpatients age 18 74 year time consent Patients meet DSMIVTR criterion bipolar I disorder , recent episode manic , hypomanic , mixed without rapid cycle disease course ( ≥ 4 episode mood disturbance , < 8 episode previous 12 month prior screen ) . Patients imminent risk suicide injury self , others , property . Patients otherwise consider ineligible study investigator .
